DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine predictive factor poor compliance sleep disorder breathe therapy chronic heart failure patient treated central sleep apnea . DOC.brief_title: French Cohort Study Chronic Heart Failure Patients With Central Sleep Apnoea Eligible Adaptive Servo-Ventilation ( PaceWave , AutoSet CS , AirCurve 10CS ) : Predictive Factors Poor Compliance ( FACE )
